items.title: Trust Without Ads – Why credibility is the new marketing.
Branding in Web3 – Building loyalty through shared narratives.
The Culture Layer – How belief and memes drive blockchain adoption.

cards.text: 1.46% Governance Voting Power in A $21B Ecosystem

about.title: ABOUT
about.content: Dumpling is a bilingual Web3 educator and strategist bridging retail, institutional, and academic worlds. She creates insightful, story-driven content that connects blockchain’s human and cultural layers, offering first-hand perspective from the industry front line.

items.quote: Dumpling helped us go from 0 to 1 within a month, precisely defining our brand positioning through her deep understanding of Web3 and sharp eye for team strengths.
items.author: Hinson Wong, CFA, CEO of DeltaDefi

items.quote: Dumpling is the best communicator and mediator I’ve ever seen — she commands a room full of strong personalities while making everyone feel heard.
items.author: Jim Edington, Owner of Western Pacific Insurance

items.quote: In a trustless ecosystem, credibility becomes a form of capital.
Education in Web3 is no longer top-down, it's peer-to-peer.
Blockchain's rise is not just technological; it's a cultural inflection point.

achievements.text: Supported 10+ Web3 teams on brand, community, and trust.
Helped teams 2.4x their X engagement and 3x followers organically.
Guided 60+ founders in their Web3 journey.

hero.title: Dumpling
hero.subtitle: A bilingual Web3 YouTuber and cultural strategist

items.description: Guest talk on Careers in Web3.
Contributing to PhD study on blockchain business models
